title: What will you do with your gasoline-powered car the day they are banned and the entire world goes electric? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a civilised world governments do not go banning anything abruptly. They take learned and consensus decisions. You can own gasoline powered car as long government regulation doesn’t mandate stopping production of new ICEVs in your country. The logic is your car will be allowed on the road till the new cars produced are on the streets. Individuals need not take the issue of gasoline powered cars vis a vis EVs more seriously than the regulators.
